form_description: Extract comprehensive clinical trial data with multi-stage dependencies: demographics → study design → interventions → outcomes → statistics

fields.extraction_hints: Look in methods section, abstract, or study design description

fields.field_description: Total number of participants enrolled in the study
fields.extraction_hints: Look in methods section, participant flow, or results section

fields.field_description: Name of the primary intervention being tested
fields.extraction_hints: Look in methods section, intervention description. Extract only if study_type indicates an interventional study

fields.field_description: Dosage or frequency of the intervention
fields.extraction_hints: Look in methods section. Only extract if intervention_name was identified

fields.field_description: Type of control group used in the study
fields.extraction_hints: Look in methods section. Only extract if study_type is interventional and intervention_name exists

fields.field_description: Primary outcome measure of the study
fields.example: Reduction in plaque index at 4 weeks
fields.extraction_hints: Look in methods or results section. Extract outcome that was pre-specified as primary

fields.field_description: Result of the primary outcome measurement
fields.example: Mean reduction of 0.45 (SD 0.12) in intervention group vs 0.23 (SD 0.15) in control
fields.extraction_hints: Look in results section. Extract only if primary_outcome was identified

fields.field_description: Whether the primary outcome showed statistical significance
fields.extraction_hints: Look in results section for p-values or confidence intervals. Extract only if primary_outcome_result exists
Look in results section. Extract only if statistical_significance indicates significance was tested

fields.field_description: Effect size measure (e.g., Cohen's d, odds ratio, relative risk)
fields.extraction_hints: Look in results section. Extract only if primary_outcome_result and statistical analysis were reported

fields.field_description: Whether adverse events were reported in the study
fields.extraction_hints: Look in results or safety section. Extract only if intervention_name exists (interventional studies)
Look in safety or adverse events section. Extract only if adverse_events_reported is true
Look in methods section. Extract only if study_type indicates a longitudinal study
